blocks.name: bezoutlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ bezout . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Mar-2014.)

thm bezoutlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cn, wrex(s1, cz, wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), c1))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), c1))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), c1))), diffsw(s2, w0))
  sylsyld(w0, wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), c1), wrex(s1, cz, wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2)))))), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), cn))
  mpd(w0, wrex(s1, cz, wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2)))))), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  syl(w0, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, cz))
  vtoclga(s0, c0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  rexbidv(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(c0, cmul, cv(s1))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)), cfv(cabs, c0), co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s0), c0, cabs)
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, cmul, cv(s1))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  zre(cv(s0))
  mpjaod(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cneg(cv(s0))))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wcel(nat1, cz), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), cmul, nat1)))
  1z()
  eqcomd(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), cmul, nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  ax-1rid(cv(s0))
  rspceeqv(s1, nat1, cz, cv(s0), co(cv(s0), cmul, nat1), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), nat1, cv(s0), cmul)
  rexbidv(s1, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1))))
  eqeq1(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cv(s0), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cneg(cv(s0))), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cneg(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cneg(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cz), wceq(cneg(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cneg(nat1))))
  neg1z()
  eqtr3d(cneg(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cneg(nat1)), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  mulm1d(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cneg(nat1))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  neg1cn()
  recn(cv(s0))
  mulcom(cneg(nat1), cv(s0))
  rspceeqv(s1, cneg(nat1), cz, cneg(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cneg(nat1)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), cneg(nat1), cv(s0), cmul)
  rexbidv(s1, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cneg(cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(cneg(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1))))
  eqeq1(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cneg(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)))
  absor(cv(s0))
  reximdva(s1, cz, w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(c0, cmul, cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2))))))
  syl6bir(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(c0, cmul, cv(s1))), wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2))))), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, nat0))))
  eqeq2d(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, nat0)), co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, nat0)), co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, nat0), nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  mul01d(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cz), wcel(c2, cc))
  zcnd(c2, w0)
  addid1d(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cz), wcel(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s1), cc))
  zcnd(c0, w0)
  zcn(cv(s1))
  mulcl(c0, cv(s1))
  mpan(wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, nat0))), wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2))))), wcel(nat0, cz))
  0z()
  rspceeqv(s2, nat0, cz, cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, nat0)), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2))))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2)), co(c2, cmul, nat0), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))
  oveq2(cv(s2), nat0, c2, cmul)
  syl(w0, wi(wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), cn)), wcel(c0, cz))
  ex(wcel(c0, cz), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), cn))
  nnabscl(c0)
  simplbi2com(wrex(s1, cz, wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2)))))), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), cn), wcel(cfv(cabs, c0), c1))
  elrab2(s0, cfv(cabs, c0), c1, cn, wrex(s1, cz, wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2)))))), wrex(s1, cz, wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2)))))))
  2rexbidv(s1, s2, cz, cz, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cabs, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2)))))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2))))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(c0, cmul, cv(s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(cabs, c0), co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cmul, nat1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cv(s0))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cmul, cneg(nat1))
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cneg(cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cabs, cv(s0))
  diff.cneg.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cz.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, nat0))
  diff.co.s(s2, c0, cmul, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, c2, cmul, nat0)
  diff.cmul.s(s2)
  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, cz, wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2))))))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s2, cz, wceq(cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2)))))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(cabs, c0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cabs, c0)
  diff.cabs.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(s2)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmul, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cmul, cv(s2))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cfv(cabs, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cabs, c0)
  diff.cabs.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), cfv(cabs, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cabs, c0)
  diff.cabs.s(s2)
}

thm bezoutlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ≠ 0 →(abs ` c0)∈ c1))
  ⊣ c1 = { s0 ∈ ℕ | ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ, s0 =((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2))))}
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ≠ 0 →(abs ` c0)∈ c1)), d(s1, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ≠ 0 →(abs ` c0)∈ c1)), d(s0, w0))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ≠ 0 →(abs ` c0)∈ c1)), d(s2, w0))
  sylsyld(w0, c0 ≠ 0, (abs ` c0)∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2)))), (abs ` c0)∈ ℕ)
  mpd(w0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2)))), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)=(c0[×]s1)))
  syl(w0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)=(c0[×]s1)), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  vtoclga(s0, c0, cz, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)=(c0[×]s1)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` s0)=(s0[×]s1)))
  rexbidv(s1, cz, s0 = c0, (abs ` s0)=(s0[×]s1), (abs ` c0)=(c0[×]s1))
  eqeq12d((abs ` s0), (s0[×]s1), (abs ` c0), (c0[×]s1), s0 = c0)
  fveq2(s0, c0, cabs)
  oveq1(s0, c0, cmul, s1)
  syl(s0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` s0)=(s0[×]s1)), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  zre(s0)
  mpjaod(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` s0)=(s0[×]s1)), (abs ` s0)= s0, (abs ` s0)= -u(s0))
  syl5ibrcom(s0 ∈ ℝ, (abs ` s0)= s0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` s0)=(s0[×]s1)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, s0 =(s0[×]s1)))
  sylancr(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, s0 =(s0[×]s1)), 1 ∈ ℤ, s0 =(s0[×]1))
  1z()
  eqcomd(s0, (s0[×]1), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  ax-1rid(s0)
  rspceeqv(s1, nat1, cz, s0, (s0[×]1), (s0[×]s1))
  oveq2(s1, nat1, s0, cmul)
  rexbidv(s1, cz, (abs ` s0)= s0, (abs ` s0)=(s0[×]s1), s0 =(s0[×]s1))
  eqeq1((abs ` s0), s0, (s0[×]s1))
  syl5ibrcom(s0 ∈ ℝ, (abs ` s0)= -u(s0), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` s0)=(s0[×]s1)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, -u(s0)=(s0[×]s1)))
  sylancr(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, -u(s0)=(s0[×]s1)), -u(1)∈ ℤ, -u(s0)=(s0[×]-u(1)))
  neg1z()
  eqtr3d(-u(s0), (s0[×]-u(1)), (-u(1)[×]s0), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  mulm1d(s0, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  sylancr(s0 ∈ ℝ, (-u(1)[×]s0)=(s0[×]-u(1)), -u(1)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ ℂ)
  neg1cn()
  recn(s0)
  mulcom(-u(1), s0)
  rspceeqv(s1, -u(1), cz, -u(s0), (s0[×]-u(1)), (s0[×]s1))
  oveq2(s1, -u(1), s0, cmul)
  rexbidv(s1, cz, (abs ` s0)= -u(s0), (abs ` s0)=(s0[×]s1), -u(s0)=(s0[×]s1))
  eqeq1((abs ` s0), -u(s0), (s0[×]s1))
  absor(s0)
  reximdva(s1, cz, w0, (abs ` c0)=(c0[×]s1), ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2))))
  syl6bir((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℤ), (abs ` c0)=(c0[×]s1), ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2))), (abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]0)))
  eqeq2d((abs ` c0), ((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]0)), (c0[×]s1), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℤ))
  eqtrd(((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]0)), (c0[×]s1), ((c0[×]s1)[+]0), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℤ))
  oveq2d((c0[×]s1), caddc, (c2[×]0), nat0, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℤ))
  mul01d(c2, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℤ))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  zcnd(c2, w0)
  addid1d((c0[×]s1), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℤ))
  syl2an(w0, s1 ∈ ℤ, (c0[×]s1)∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℂ, s1 ∈ ℂ)
  zcnd(c0, w0)
  zcn(s1)
  mulcl(c0, s1)
  mpan((abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]0)), ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2))), 0 ∈ ℤ)
  0z()
  rspceeqv(s2, nat0, cz, (abs ` c0), ((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]0)), ((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2)))
  oveq2d((c0[×]s1), caddc, (c2[×]s2), (c2[×]0), s2 = 0)
  oveq2(s2, nat0, c2, cmul)
  syl(w0, (c0 ≠ 0 →(abs ` c0)∈ ℕ), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ex(c0 ∈ ℤ, c0 ≠ 0, (abs ` c0)∈ ℕ)
  nnabscl(c0)
  simplbi2com(∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2)))), (abs ` c0)∈ ℕ, (abs ` c0)∈ c1)
  elrab2(s0, (abs ` c0), c1, cn, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2)))), ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ, s0 =((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2)))))
  2rexbidv(s1, s2, cz, cz, s0 =(abs ` c0), s0 =((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2)), (abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2)))
  eqeq1(s0, (abs ` c0), ((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2)))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, cz, (abs ` c0)=(c0[×]s1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (abs ` c0), (c0[×]s1))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, cmul, nat1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (abs ` s0), s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, cmul, -u(1))
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (abs ` s0), -u(s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cabs, s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cz.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, (c0[×]s1), caddc, (c2[×]0))
  diff.co.s(s2, c0, cmul, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, c2, cmul, nat0)
  diff.cmul.s(s2)
  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, cz, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ,(abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2))))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s2, cz, (abs ` c0)=((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2)))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (abs ` c0), ((c0[×]s1)[+](c2[×]s2)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cabs, c0)
  diff.cabs.s(s0)

blocks.content: Lemma for ~ bezout . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm bezoutlem4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s0, cn, wrex(s1, cz, wrex(s2, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, co(c1, cmul, cv(s2))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| wceq(c3, cinf(c2, cr, clt))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c2, c3, w0)
  mpbir2and(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c3), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)))
  mpd(w0, wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cle, c3), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c3))
  mp2and(w0, wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c3), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), c0)), wrex(hs1, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), c1)))
  mpbid(w0, wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), c0)), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0))
  simpld(w0, wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), c0))), wcel(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  divides(hs0, co(c0, cgcd, c1), c0)
  mpbid(w0, wrex(hs1, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), c1)), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1))
  simprd(w0, wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0))
  syl2anc(w0, wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  gcddvds(c0, c1)

blocks.name: bezout
blocks.content: Bézout's identity: For any integers ` A ` and ` B ` , there are integers ` x , y ` such that ` ( A gcd B ) = A x. x + B x. y ` . This is Metamath 100 proof #60. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Feb-2014.)

blocks.name: dvdsgcd
blocks.content: An integer which divides each of two others also divides their gcd. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 22-Jun-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdsgcd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2))))
} = {
  mpid(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2)), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cz, wceq(co(c1, cgcd, c2), co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)))))))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cz, wceq(co(c1, cgcd, c2), co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)))))))
  bezout(hs0, hs1, c1, c2)
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wi(wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cz, wceq(co(c1, cgcd, c2), co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)))))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2))))
  rexlimdvv(hs0, hs1, cz, cz, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))), wceq(co(c1, cgcd, c2), co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2)))
  3expia(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wi(wceq(co(c1, cgcd, c2), co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2))))
  syl5ibrcom(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))), wceq(co(c1, cgcd, c2), co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)))), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)))))
  breqtrd(c0, cdvds, co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1))), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c1), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2)), w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))))
  3coml(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c1), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2))))
  3impia(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c1), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2))))
  dvds2ln(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, c1, c2)
  oveq12d(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c1), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)), w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))))
  syl2anc(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c1), co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  simp3l(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))
  simp12(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c1), co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(cv(hs0))
  zcn(c1)
  mulcom(cv(hs0), c1)
  syl2anc(w3a(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  simp3r(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))
  simp13(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cz), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  zcn(cv(hs1))
  zcn(c2)
  mulcom(cv(hs1), c2)
  breq2(co(c1, cgcd, c2), co(co(c1, cmul, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1))), c0, cdvds)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))))
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2)))
}

blocks.name: dvdsgcdb
blocks.content: Biconditional form of ~ dvdsgcd . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdsgcdb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wb(wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2))))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2)))
  dvdsgcd(c0, c1, c2)
  jcad(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2))
  mpan2d(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cdvds, c1))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cdvds, c1))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cdvds, c2))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2)), wbr(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cdvds, c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  dvdstr(c0, co(c1, cgcd, c2), c1)
  mpan2d(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2), wbr(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cdvds, c2))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wbr(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cdvds, c2))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wbr(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cdvds, c2), wbr(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cdvds, c1))
  gcddvds(c1, c2)
  syld3an2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c1, cgcd, c2)), wbr(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cdvds, c2)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c2)), wcel(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cz))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(co(c1, cgcd, c2), cz))
  nn0zd(co(c1, cgcd, c2), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)))
  gcdcl(c1, c2)
  dvdstr(c0, co(c1, cgcd, c2), c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dvdsgcdb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)→((c0[||]c1 ∧ c0[||]c2)↔ c0[||](c1[gcd]c2)))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (c0[||]c1 ∧ c0[||]c2), c0[||](c1[gcd]c2))
  dvdsgcd(c0, c1, c2)
  jcad((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), c0[||](c1[gcd]c2), c0[||]c1, c0[||]c2)
  mpan2d((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), c0[||](c1[gcd]c2), c0[||]c1, (c1[gcd]c2)[||]c1)
  3adant1(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ, (c1[gcd]c2)[||]c1)
  simpld((c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (c1[gcd]c2)[||]c1, (c1[gcd]c2)[||]c2)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), ((c0[||](c1[gcd]c2)∧(c1[gcd]c2)[||]c1)→ c0[||]c1), c0 ∈ ℤ, (c1[gcd]c2)∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ)
  simp1(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ)
  simp2(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ)
  dvdstr(c0, (c1[gcd]c2), c1)
  mpan2d((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), c0[||](c1[gcd]c2), c0[||]c2, (c1[gcd]c2)[||]c2)
  3adant1(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ, (c1[gcd]c2)[||]c2)
  simprd((c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (c1[gcd]c2)[||]c2, (c1[gcd]c2)[||]c1)
  gcddvds(c1, c2)
  syld3an2(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ, ((c0[||](c1[gcd]c2)∧(c1[gcd]c2)[||]c2)→ c0[||]c2), (c1[gcd]c2)∈ ℤ)
  3adant1(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ, (c1[gcd]c2)∈ ℤ)
  nn0zd((c1[gcd]c2), (c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ))
  gcdcl(c1, c2)
  dvdstr(c0, (c1[gcd]c2), c2)
}

blocks.name: dfgcd2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the ` gcd ` operator, see definition in [ApostolNT] p. 15. (Contributed by AV, 8-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfgcd2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wceq(c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), w3a(wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wa(wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wral(s0, cz, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c2))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  impbida(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), w3a(wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wa(wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wral(s0, cz, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c2)))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1))), w3a(wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wa(wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wral(s0, cz, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c2)))), w3a(wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wral(s0, cz, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, co(c0, cgcd, c1))))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), w3a(wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wral(s0, cz, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, co(c0, cgcd, c1))))))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wral(s0, cz, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, co(c0, cgcd, c1)))))
  nn0ge0d(co(c0, cgcd, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  gcdcl(c0, c1)
  gcddvds(c0, c1)
  ralrimiva(s0, cz, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, co(c0, cgcd, c1))))
  sylbir(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, co(c0, cgcd, c1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  biancomi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  3anass(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  dvdsgcd(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wb(w3a(wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wa(wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wral(s0, cz, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c2)))), w3a(wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wral(s0, cz, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, co(c0, cgcd, c1)))))))
  3anbi123d(wceq(c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wa(wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1)), wral(s0, cz, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c2))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wral(s0, cz, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, co(c0, cgcd, c1)))))
  breq2(c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat0, cle)
  anbi12d(wceq(c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wbr(c2, cdvds, c0), wbr(c2, cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1))
  breq1(c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0)
  breq1(c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)
  ralbidv(s0, cz, wceq(c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c2)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, co(c0, cgcd, c1))))

blocks.name: absmulgcd
blocks.content: Distribute absolute value of multiplication over gcd. Theorem 1.4(c) in [ApostolNT] p. 16. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 22-Jun-2011.)

  3impdi(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ, ((abs `(c0[×]c1))[gcd](abs `(c0[×]c2)))=((c0[×]c1)[gcd](c0[×]c2)))
  syl2an((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), ((abs `(c0[×]c1))[gcd](abs `(c0[×]c2)))=((c0[×]c1)[gcd](c0[×]c2)), (c0[×]c1)∈ ℤ, (c0[×]c2)∈ ℤ)
  zmulcl(c0, c1)
  zmulcl(c0, c2)
  gcdabs((c0[×]c1), (c0[×]c2))
  syl3an(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ, (((abs ` c0)[×](abs ` c1))[gcd]((abs ` c0)[×](abs ` c2)))=((abs ` c0)[×]((abs ` c1)[gcd](abs ` c2))), (abs ` c0)∈ ℕ0, (abs ` c1)∈ ℤ, (abs ` c2)∈ ℤ)
  nn0abscl(c0)
  zabscl(c1)
  zabscl(c2)
  mulgcd((abs ` c0), (abs ` c1), (abs ` c2))
  oveq2d((abs ` c0), cmul, ((abs ` c1)[gcd](abs ` c2)), (c1[gcd]c2), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ, ((abs ` c1)[gcd](abs ` c2))=(c1[gcd]c2))
  gcdabs(c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: mulgcdr
blocks.content: Reverse distribution law for the ` gcd ` operator. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 2-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mulgcdr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cmul, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cmul, c2), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cgcd, co(c2, cmul, c1)), co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  3coml(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0), wceq(co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cgcd, co(c2, cmul, c1)), co(c2, cmul, co(c0, cgcd, c1))))
  mulgcd(c2, c0, c1)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cmul, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c0), co(c2, cmul, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  mulcomd(c0, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c0, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  mulcomd(c1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c1)
  mulcomd(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  nn0cnd(co(c0, cgcd, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cn0))
  gcdcl(c0, c1)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c2, cc))
  nn0cn(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mulgcdr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0)→((c0[×]c2)[gcd](c1[×]c2))=((c0[gcd]c1)[×]c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(((c0[×]c2)[gcd](c1[×]c2)), ((c0[gcd]c1)[×]c2), ((c2[×]c0)[gcd](c2[×]c1)), (c2[×](c0[gcd]c1)), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  3coml(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℕ0, ((c2[×]c0)[gcd](c2[×]c1))=(c2[×](c0[gcd]c1)))
  mulgcd(c2, c0, c1)
  oveq12d((c0[×]c2), cgcd, (c1[×]c2), (c2[×]c0), (c2[×]c1), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  mulcomd(c0, c2, (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℕ0, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  zcn(c0)
  mulcomd(c1, c2, (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  3ad2ant2(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  zcn(c1)
  mulcomd((c0[gcd]c1), c2, (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  nn0cnd((c0[gcd]c1), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℕ0))
  3adant3(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℕ0, (c0[gcd]c1)∈ ℕ0)
  gcdcl(c0, c1)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℕ0, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  nn0cn(c2)
}

blocks.name: gcddiv

thm gcddiv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  nnz(c2)

  divides(hs1, c2, c1)

  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn), wi(wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cz, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), c1)))), wceq(co(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cdiv, c2)))))
  rexlimdvv(hs0, hs1, cz, cz, wcel(c2, cn), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cdiv, c2))))
  expcom(wcel(c2, cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cdiv, c2)))))
  3expa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn), wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cdiv, c2)))))
  syl5ibcom(w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn)), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cdiv, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), cgcd, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2)), cdiv, c2), co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), cgcd, co(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), cdiv, c2))))
  3eqtr4d(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), cgcd, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2)), cdiv, c2), co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), cgcd, co(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), cdiv, c2)), co(co(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, cv(hs1)), cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), co(cv(hs0), cgcd, cv(hs1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn)))
  divcan4d(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, cv(hs1)), c2, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn)))
  3adant3(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, cv(hs1)), cc))
  nn0cnd(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)))
  gcdcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  oveq1d(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), cgcd, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2)), cdiv, c2, co(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, cv(hs1)), cmul, c2), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn)))
  syl3an3(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), cgcd, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2)), co(co(cv(hs0), cgcd, cv(hs1)), cmul, c2)), wcel(c2, cn0))
  nnnn0(c2)
  mulgcdr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c2)
  oveq12d(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), cgcd, co(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), cv(hs0), cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn)))
  divcan4d(cv(hs0), c2, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  zcn(cv(hs0))
  divcan4d(cv(hs1), c2, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  zcn(cv(hs1))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c2, cc))
  nncn(c2)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz), wcel(c2, cn), wne(c2, nat0))
  nnne0(c2)
  eqeq12d(co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), cgcd, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2)), cdiv, c2), co(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), cdiv, c2), cgcd, co(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), cdiv, c2)), co(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdiv, c2), co(co(c0, cdiv, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), c1)))
  oveq1d(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), cgcd, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2)), cdiv, c2, co(c0, cgcd, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), c1)))
  oveq12(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), c0, co(cv(hs1), cmul, c2), c1, cgcd)

  oveq1(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c2), c0, cdiv, c2)

blocks.name: gcdmultiple
blocks.content: The GCD of a multiple of a number is the number itself. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm gcdmultiple(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, c1)), c0))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, c1)), c0))
  nnind(hs0, hs1, c1, wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, c1)), c0)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), c0)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), c0)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1))), c0)), wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), c0)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat1), wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), c0), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), c0, co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  oveq2d(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cmul, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), nat1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), nat1, c0, cmul)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), c0), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1))), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), c0, co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2d(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cmul)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), c0), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), c0, co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2d(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c0, cmul)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), c0), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, c1)), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), c0, co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2d(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cmul, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cmul)
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), c0, co(c0, cgcd, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  oveq2d(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  mulid1d(c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgcd, c0), c0, cfv(cabs, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c0), cfv(cabs, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  gcdid(c0)
  absidd(c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  nnre(c0)
  nn0ge0d(c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  nnnn0(c0)
  a2d(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1))), c0), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), c0))
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wi(wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1))), c0), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), c0)))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1))), c0), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1))), c0, co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1))), co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))), co(c0, cgcd, co(co(c0, cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))

thm gcdmultiplez(class c0, class c1) {

  eqtrd(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(c0, cmul, cfv(cabs, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cabs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cabs, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

  nnzd(c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wne(c1, nat0)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cz))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  nnz(c0)
  zmulcl(c0, c1)
  gcdabs2(c0, co(c0, cmul, c1))
  anassrs(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cfv(cabs, c1))), c0))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, cfv(cabs, c1))), c0), wcel(cfv(cabs, c1), cn))
  nnabscl(c1)
  gcdmultiple(c0, cfv(cabs, c1))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, nat0)), c0, co(c0, cgcd, nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, nat0)), co(c0, cgcd, nat0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, nat0)), co(c0, cgcd, nat0)), wcel(c0, cc))

thm gcdmultiplez(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)→(c0[gcd](c0[×]c1))= c0)
} = {
  pm2.61ne(c1, nat0, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), (c0[gcd](c0[×]c1))= c0, (c0[gcd](c0[×]0))= c0)
  eqeq1d((c0[gcd](c0[×]c1)), c0, (c0[gcd](c0[×]0)), c1 = 0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgcd, (c0[×]c1), (c0[×]0), c1 = 0)
  oveq2(c1, nat0, c0, cmul)
  3eqtr3d((c0[gcd](c0[×]c1)), c0, (c0[gcd](abs `(c0[×]c1))), (c0[gcd](c0[×](abs ` c1))), ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)∧ c1 ≠ 0))
  adantr((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), c1 ≠ 0, (c0[gcd](abs `(c0[×]c1)))=(c0[gcd](c0[×](abs ` c1))))
  oveq2d(c0, cgcd, (abs `(c0[×]c1)), (c0[×](abs ` c1)), (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ))
  eqtrd((abs `(c0[×]c1)), (c0[×](abs ` c1)), ((abs ` c0)[×](abs ` c1)), (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, (abs `(c0[×]c1))=((abs ` c0)[×](abs ` c1)), c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  zcn(c1)
  absmul(c0, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, ((abs ` c0)[×](abs ` c1))=(c0[×](abs ` c1)))
  oveq1d((abs ` c0), cmul, (abs ` c1), c0, c0 ∈ ℕ)
  absidd(c0, c0 ∈ ℕ)
  nnre(c0)
  nn0ge0d(c0, c0 ∈ ℕ)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)∧ c1 ≠ 0), (c0[gcd](abs `(c0[×]c1)))=(c0[gcd](c0[×]c1)), c0 ∈ ℤ, (c0[×]c1)∈ ℤ)
  nnzd(c0, ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)∧ c1 ≠ 0))
  simpll(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c1 ≠ 0)
  adantr((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), c1 ≠ 0, (c0[×]c1)∈ ℤ)
  sylan(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, (c0[×]c1)∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  nnz(c0)
  zmulcl(c0, c1)
  gcdabs2(c0, (c0[×]c1))
  anassrs(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c1 ≠ 0, (c0[gcd](c0[×](abs ` c1)))= c0)
  sylan2(c0 ∈ ℕ, (c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ≠ 0), (c0[gcd](c0[×](abs ` c1)))= c0, (abs ` c1)∈ ℕ)
  nnabscl(c1)
  gcdmultiple(c0, (abs ` c1))
  eqtrd((c0[gcd](c0[×]0)), c0, (c0[gcd]0), (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ))
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, (c0[gcd](c0[×]0))=(c0[gcd]0))
  syl(c0 ∈ ℕ, (c0[gcd](c0[×]0))=(c0[gcd]0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  nncn(c0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgcd, (c0[×]0), nat0, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  mul01(c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, (c0[gcd]0)= c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ ℕ, (c0[gcd]0)= c0, c0 ∈ ℕ0)
  nnnn0(c0)
  nn0gcdid0(c0)
}

blocks.name: gcdzeq
blocks.content: A positive integer ` A ` is equal to its gcd with an integer ` B ` if and only if ` A ` divides ` B ` . Generalization of ~ gcdeq . (Contributed by AV, 1-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm gcdzeq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c0), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c0), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c0), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0))
  breq1(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c0, cdvds, c1)
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c0), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1))))
  jctild(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)))
  mpand(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(c0, cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c0), wcel(c0, cz))
  iddvds(c0)
  syl31anc(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdvds, c0), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c0, cgcd, c1))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wn(wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wn(wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wn(wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))), wne(c0, nat0))
  nnne0(c0)
  necon3ai(c0, nat0, wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0)))
  simpl(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))
  dvdslegcd(c0, c0, c1)
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cle, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)), wcel(c0, cz))
  gcddvds(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cle, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cz), wcel(c0, cn))
  nn0zd(co(c0, cgcd, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz))
  dvdsle(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c0)
  letri3d(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)))
  nn0red(co(c0, cgcd, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cn0), wcel(c0, cz))
  nnz(c0)
  gcdcl(c0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cr))
  nnre(c0)
}

thm gcdzeq(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)→((c0[gcd]c1)= c0 ↔ c0[||]c1))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), (c0[gcd]c1)= c0, c0[||]c1)
  syl5ibcom((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), (c0[gcd]c1)= c0, c0[||]c1, (c0[gcd]c1)[||]c1)
  simprd((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), (c0[gcd]c1)[||]c1, (c0[gcd]c1)[||]c0)
  breq1((c0[gcd]c1), c0, cdvds, c1)
  sylibrd((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), c0[||]c1, (c0[gcd]c1)= c0, ((c0[gcd]c1)[≤]c0 ∧ c0[≤](c0[gcd]c1)))
  jctild((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), c0[||]c1, (c0[gcd]c1)[≤]c0, c0[≤](c0[gcd]c1))
  mpand((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), c0[||]c1, c0[≤](c0[gcd]c1), c0[||]c0)
  syl((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), c0[||]c0, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  iddvds(c0)
  syl31anc((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), ((c0[||]c0 ∧ c0[||]c1)→ c0[≤](c0[gcd]c1)), c0 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, ¬(c0 = 0 ∧ c1 = 0))
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, ¬(c0 = 0 ∧ c1 = 0))
  syl(c0 ∈ ℕ, ¬(c0 = 0 ∧ c1 = 0), c0 ≠ 0)
  nnne0(c0)
  necon3ai(c0, nat0, (c0 = 0 ∧ c1 = 0))
  simpl(c0 = 0, c1 = 0)
  dvdslegcd(c0, c0, c1)
  mpd((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), (c0[gcd]c1)[≤]c0, (c0[gcd]c1)[||]c0)
  simpld((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), (c0[gcd]c1)[||]c0, (c0[gcd]c1)[||]c1)
  sylan(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, ((c0[gcd]c1)[||]c0 ∧(c0[gcd]c1)[||]c1), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  gcddvds(c0, c1)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), ((c0[gcd]c1)[||]c0 →(c0[gcd]c1)[≤]c0), (c0[gcd]c1)∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ ℕ)
  nn0zd((c0[gcd]c1), (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ))
  simpl(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ)
  dvdsle((c0[gcd]c1), c0)
  letri3d((c0[gcd]c1), c0, (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ))
  nn0red((c0[gcd]c1), (c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ))
  sylan(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, (c0[gcd]c1)∈ ℕ0, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  nnz(c0)
  gcdcl(c0, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ ℝ)
  nnre(c0)
}

blocks.name: gcdeq
blocks.content: ` A ` is equal to its gcd with ` B ` if and only if ` A ` divides ` B ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 8-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: dvdssqim
blocks.content: Unidirectional form of ~ dvdssq . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvdssqim(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cdvds, co(c1, cexp, nat2))))
} = {
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cdvds, co(c1, cexp, nat2)), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1)))
  divides(hs0, c0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wi(wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cdvds, co(c1, cexp, nat2))))
  rexlimdva(hs0, cz, wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cdvds, co(c1, cexp, nat2)))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), c1), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cdvds, co(c1, cexp, nat2)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cdvds, co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, c0), cexp, nat2)))

blocks.name: rpmulgcd
blocks.content: If ` K ` and ` M ` are relatively prime, then the GCD of ` K ` and ` M x. N ` is the GCD of ` K ` and ` N ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rpmulgcd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(c0, cgcd, c2)))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(c0, cgcd, c2), co(c0, cgcd, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(c0, cgcd, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2)))))
  eqtr3d(co(c0, cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(c0, cgcd, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2))), co(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, c2)), c0))
  gcdmultiple(c0, c2)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(co(c0, cgcd, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(c0, cgcd, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cgcd, co(c1, cmul, c2)))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cz), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cz))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c0, cz))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cz))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  zmulcl(c0, c2)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cz))
  syl2an(wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz))
  nnz(c2)
  zmulcl(c1, c2)

blocks.name: rplpwr
blocks.content: If ` A ` and ` B ` are relatively prime, then so are ` A ^ N ` and ` B ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: rppwr
blocks.content: If ` A ` and ` B ` are relatively prime, then so are ` A ^ N ` and ` B ^ N ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)

thm rppwr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, co(c1, cexp, c2)), co(co(c1, cexp, c2), cgcd, c0)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c1, cexp, c2), cz))
  nnzd(c0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)))
  nnzd(co(c1, cexp, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)))

  sylc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wceq(co(co(c1, cexp, c2), cgcd, c0), nat1), w3a(wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(c1, cgcd, c0), nat1))
  3jca(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1)), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c2, cn))

  eqeq1d(co(c0, cgcd, c1), nat1, co(c1, cgcd, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(co(c0, cgcd, c1), co(c1, cgcd, c0)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))

  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat2), cdvds, co(c1, cexp, nat2)))

blocks.name: bezoutr
blocks.content: Partial converse to ~ bezout . Existence of a linear combination does not set the GCD, but it does upper bound it. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm bezoutr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))))
} = {
  syl32anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))), wcel(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cz), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cz), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c3), cz), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, co(c0, cmul, c2)), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c3)))
  zmulcld(c0, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))))
  zmulcld(c1, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))))
  dvdsmultr1d(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c0, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))
  simpld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1))
  dvdsmultr1d(co(c0, cgcd, c1), c1, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cz))
  nn0zd(co(c0, cgcd, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  gcdcl(c0, c1)
  simplr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))
  simprd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c0), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, c1)))
  gcddvds(c0, c1)
  imp(w3a(wcel(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cz), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cz), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c3), cz)), wa(wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, co(c0, cmul, c2)), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c3))), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))))
  dvds2add(co(c0, cgcd, c1), co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c1, cmul, c3))

blocks.name: bezoutr1
blocks.content: Converse of ~ bezout for when the greater common divisor is one (sufficient condition for relative primality). (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  mpd(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), nat1)), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cle, nat1), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, nat1))

  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3)), nat1), wbr(co(c0, cgcd, c1), cdvds, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c1, cmul, c3))))
  bezoutr(c0, c1, c2, c3)
